name: I dream to become THE STRONGEST
name_original: I dream to become THE STRONGEST
description:
Submission to Touhou Fan Game Jam 8

Ex-Soldier of Shinra, peacekeeper of Gensokyo, the strongest there is. At least, in her dreams.

Traverse Cirno's dreams, fight strong opponents using strength and wits. In this 2D action platformer, you get to take Cirno through a small adventure and fight the inhabitants of her mind. Using Cirno's Perfect Freeze, she can stop her enemies' bullets in its track and open up new avenues to approach the enemy.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys to move and traverse the battlefield
  • Z to swing your many swords and vanquish your foes, can also be used in the air
  • X if your ice bar is full to activate Perfect Freeze
  • C to jump, do it again to double jump
  • Spacebar to dodge attacks and reposition, can also be used in the air

Credits:

  • iceing11 - Project Lead, Programmer
  • Alananhkspace - Artist
  • Cattocrows - Artist, Writer
  • Pathtolegend - Composer
  • CuteShibaAuthur - Composer
